transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road. I can take you to the park. What am I?

hints.text: 🚏 I stop at bus stops to collect people.
🚌 I am bigger than a car and carry many people.
🚦 You can catch me on a scheduled route.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to faraway lands. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I soar above the clouds.
✈️ I have wings and engines.
🌍 I can take you to different countries.

transport.question: I go on the water and can be big or small. Pirates sail on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I float on the sea.
⚓ I might have sails or a motor.
🚢 I'm used to travel across the ocean.

transport.question: I go on tracks and carry many people. I say 'choo choo!' What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I travel on metal rails.
🛤️ I have many carriages.
📢 You can hear a whistle when I arrive.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🚴‍♀️ You need to balance on me.
🔔 I might have a bell to ring.
🛣️ I am good for short distances.

transport.question: I am big and carry lots of goods on the road. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I transport things in my trailer.
🚚 I am bigger than a car.
⛽ I need lots of fuel to go far.

transport.question: I fly straight up and down, and have spinning blades on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I am often used for rescue missions.
🚨 I can hover in the air.
🏥 You might see me at the hospital.

transport.question: I travel under the ground and take many people through the city. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 You can travel to many different stops.
🚦 I don't have to stop at traffic lights.
🗺️ You need a special map to understand all the stops.

transport.question: I can take you far away really fast, even to other planets! What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I go up, up, up very quickly.
👩‍🚀 Astronauts use me for space travel.
🪐 I can go where there is no air.

transport.question: I am like a train but I usually travel through city streets with tramlines above. What am I?

hints.text: 🚃 I use overhead electrical wires
📍 I tend to run on rails within the city
🔔 Listen for my bell

bug.question: I have six legs and like to buzz. I make yummy honey, what am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am yellow and black
🌷 I fly around flowers
🍯 People like to eat what I make

bug.question: I am a bug that hops and am green. What am I?

hints.text: 💚 I blend in with the grass
🎶 I make a chirping sound
🦵 I have strong legs for jumping

bug.question: I'm a red bug with black spots. People say I'm lucky. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I have a round body
⚫ I have small circles on my back
🐞 Farmers like me because I eat other bugs

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and turn into something beautiful that flies. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have colorful wings
🐛 I eat a lot when I am young
🌸 I like to fly around flowers

bug.question: I build big hills or mounds of dirt and carry food together. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small, but strong
💪 I work with my family
🏠 I live underground

bug.question: I light up at night and fly around. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I glow in the dark
🌙 I am most active when it is dark
💡 I have a light in my abdomen

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my food. I am not an insect. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸 I have eight legs
🕷 I catch insects with my web
🚫 I am an arachnid

bug.question: I’m a long, skinny bug that walks on water. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I can move on the surface of lakes and ponds
📏 I have a very thin body
⛸ I use my legs to skate along water

bug.question: I make a loud noise at night and shed my skin. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 I sing in the summertime
🌳 I climb trees
껍 I leave behind an empty shell (exoskeleton)

bug.question: I mimic a twig to hide from predators. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I look like a small branch
🚶 I am good at camouflage
🍃 I eat leaves
